definitions.title: adj. aged
definitions.body: , only Jb (NH once [[יׇשִׁישִׁים]] old, venerable men, Levy Jastr);—abs. [[יׇשִׁישׁ]] Job 15:10; pl. [[יְשִׁישִׁים]] Job 32:6 + 2 t.;—aged, as pred. adj. Job 32:6 (opp. [[חָעִיר לְיׇמִים]]); as subst. Job 15:10 (‖[[שָׂב]]); Job 29:8 (opp. [[נערים]]); [[בִּישִׁישִׁים חָכְמָה]] Job 12:12 among aged men is wisdom (‖[[אׂרֶח יׇמִים תְּבוּנׇה]]).
